words.source: H6258 waw + adv. ʿattah 'now'; KJV 'send therefore now', ESV 'now therefore', NASB 'now therefore'

H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H4735 n.ms constr. miqneh 'livestock' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'thy cattle', ESV 'your livestock', NASB 'your livestock'
H853 waw + direct object marker; KJV 'and', ESV 'and', NASB 'and'
